interface.name: agent.world.System
interface.description: A sytem is an installation that can be used by an agent. To be used, it may require to be "enabled" or "operated".

method.name: enableIt
method.description: Must be called on a system that requires activation in order to be used.

method.name: disableIt
method.description: Stops a system from being activated. A deactivated system can't be used.

method.name: operateIt
method.description: To manage and run this element in order to activate it. Operating a 'system' object is a permanent effect. The object is activated until tthe the agent is operating it.

method.name: canBeOperated
method.description: Returns true if this entity can be operated by the agent.

method.name: canBeEnabled
method.description: Returns 'true' if this entity can be enabled by the agent.

method.name: canBeDisabled
method.description: Returns 'true' if this entity can be disabled by the agent.
